channel.title: Massey Products on Writing what I'm learning
channel.description: Recent content in Massey Products on Writing what I'm learning

item.title: On formal DG-algebras
item.description: I have recently handed in and defended my master thesis in mathematics, so I though I would go through its abstract and try to explain what it’s all about. We look at formality of DG-algebras, Massey products, A_infinity-algebras and how we can use these to some interesting results.
